metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Fighting in a Sack is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Fighting in a Sack has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Mixolydian,  and G Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
